item.title: How to Use Tallow Balm on Your Face for Clear, Hydrated Skin
item.description: How to Use Tallow Balm on Your Face Tallow balm NZ is one of the best natural moisturisers for your face. Unlike store-bought creams, it’s free from synthetic chemicals and packed with skin-loving nutrients. 1. How to Apply Tallow Balm to Your Face ✔ Start with clean, dry skin. ✔ Take a pea-sized amount—a little goes a long way! ✔ Warm it between your fingers before applying. ✔ Gently press into your skin, focusing on dry areas.
